title: Overlord Movie 1: Fushisha no Ou
content:
The first Overlord movie, "Fushisha no Ou", serves as a recap of the first half of the story. The movie covers the main plot points and key events that took place in the anime, providing a condensed version of the story for those who may have missed a few episodes. With the use of high-quality animation and a well-structured storyline, "Fushisha no Ou" provides a great refresher for fans of the series and a comprehensive introduction for new viewers.

However, not everyone may be a fan of this type of recapping, as some viewers might find it to be repetitive or too similar to the originalanime. Despite this, "Fushisha no Ou" still stands as a great way for fans to re-live some of their favorite moments from the first half of the story and for newcomers to get a taste of the world of Overlord.
